website_summaries.verdict: Simply put, there isn't a better set of wire cutters for tough materials under 1/4" thick.
pros: Mows down wire that is less than 1/4" thick and leaves a clean cut every time
It provides great leverage and will last a lifetime, too
cons: A thicker cushion on the handle would be a nice touch, but that is a minor complaint

customer_reviews.title: Swiss Made Quality - A Cut Above
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Park Tool cable cutters from Amazon, they became unserviceable after just a few cuts! I then purchased the Felco C7 cutters, they have performed extremely well making clean straight cuts in both stainless cable and cable housing. I highly recommend the Swiss built quality of Felco, they cost more but are well worth the extra dollars for a tool that will last many years. The Chinese manufactured Park Tool cutters are now in my garbage, I was so disgusted with their performance I didn't bother returning them to Amazon. I am avoiding Park Tools from now on... so should you.
customer_reviews.author: China  #1

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but not quite up to all the hype.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the many glowing reviews, I put out the extra cash for this top-rated cable cutter. I do like it and I do appreciate the solid quality. I'll probably never need to buy another cable cutter. However, it's not really the be-all and end-all others are saying. It cuts derailleur cable a bit more easily and cleanly than the less expensive units. However, when cutting brake cable with the spiral shield housing, you still have to tidy up the cut end with a file and a nail set most times--not much different from the others.
customer_reviews.author: ERIK MIDTSKOGEN

customer_reviews.title: Good, but don't expect flawless cuts in bike sprial brake housing
customer_reviews.text: The good: This thing cuts bike brake and shift housing effortlessly. It feels incredibly sharp and it seems like it will last forever. The bad: At least for spiral brake housing, don't expect this to cut a flawless 90 degree edge in the housing. More often than not, part of the spiral will collapse inwards and will need to be dressed with a grinding wheel or hand file like all other cable cutters require. If you already have a decent cable cutter this isn't going to remove the step of having to dress your housing ends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: After I read several good reviews on these wire cutters I bought a pair, but was very disappointed in them. They are not as sharp so hoped & did not cut thicker wire easily. I found them uncomfortable to hold and they did not open as wide as I thought. I returned them to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha Istanbul

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive but should last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for bicycle cable cutting including shift housing but not brake housing. Stick a sacrificial length of cable in the housing before cutting. Minimizes deformation of the metal housing on the brake housing and helps with the liner on the shift housing. You should still grind (Dremel or fine grinder/file) the brake housing to remove burrs.
customer_reviews.author: SJX40250

customer_reviews.title: Blows away the Park or Pedros tool in the quality category by a wide margin!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Blows away the Park or Pedros tool in the quality category by a wide margin! Cuts clean, cuts fast, cuts effortlessly.Swiss quality all the way. One of the best tools I've purchased in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Grant M. Holzworth

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed these for a specific project where he was cutting aircraft wire and they made clean, easy cuts. He was very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: kimberley alexander

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used.
customer_reviews.text: This package arrived over a week ago and I finally opened up the box a couple of days ago. The original packaging had been opened and re-taped. The cutters had been used. Having spent $60 for them (Prime). I had expected them to be new. The cutter edges have gouges in them and there is even a small visible chip on one of the cutting edges. I tested the cutters with 1/16" and 3/16" wire rope. They were clean cuts. My biggest concern is that the life expectancy of the cutting edges has been reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bujeaud

customer_reviews.title: Required tool for all DIY bike repair individuals
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through bicycle brake and derailleur cable with ease and will cut it all day long. Makes beautiful cuts with no crimping or collapsing of the housing. Also cuts the cable with total ease... Cannot go wrong this this tool. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: The Johnson Family

customer_reviews.title: Cuts barbed wire fencing very well.
customer_reviews.text: We were taking down a rusty old farm fence. I could almost use just one hand with this cutter and my husband did. Very nice. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ✨ Marriana Maloney ✨

customer_reviews.title: It will definitely cut larger gauge wire, however, ...
customer_reviews.text: It will definitely cut larger gauge wire, however, longer handles would result in less force needing to be applied. We used it initially to cut wire for a ball and burlap tree that we bought. Ask me again after a couple years of use, but it appears to be a well made tool.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Z

customer_reviews.title: this review is unnecessary. Felco cutters are the design on which all ...
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever used Felco products, this review is unnecessary. Felco cutters are the design on which all others are made and the standard by which all others are judged. The Swedes know how to make great cutting implements, this is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Good cutters
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of cutters for like cable these work good
customer_reviews.author: Glenna

customer_reviews.title: If you want clean-cut cables these are terrific.
customer_reviews.text: Knipex may be as good. I gave my Felco to my son. My bike repair school instructors at United Bicycle Institute recommended Felco,
customer_reviews.author: RetiredMD

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We were worried about the shipping time but it ended up delivering within the week of ordering.. the expected delivery was for about a month!! We were able to work on our deck sooner right away, used this cutter to cut up stainless steel wire and it does its thing!
customer_reviews.author: mary soumphont

customer_reviews.title: Will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very will constructed. Cut cable deals and metal seals with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rein

customer_reviews.title: Most reliable cable cutters I’ve
customer_reviews.text: The Felco cutters are reliable. I have installed rigging for movable curtains in movie theaters for over 20 years and have not found a better pair of cutters for the 1/4” and 1/8” aircraft cable I use.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Great cutters, worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Went through a lot of cheap cutters. These cutters definately lasts much longer through all the abuse I've put it through! Cutters definately fall under the 'buy nice or buy twice' category.
customer_reviews.author: ANguyen

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a champ on my 1/8” think aviation wire. Few shredded ends from careless cuts but it went thru it like butter.
customer_reviews.author: John Bandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and cut the wire and cable like butter. Very happy to add this tool to the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily to cut cables used to seal my tanker. I've bought really expensive cable cutters and they seem to be unusable after two to three weeks. These have been going strong for longer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W.

customer_reviews.title: I have very weak hands and it cuts the barbed wire easily! It comes in handy while fixing fences
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair...seemed to have lost the first. I have very weak hands and it cuts the barbed wire easily! It comes in handy while fixing fences.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cable cutters
customer_reviews.text: These are great cable cutters I use them all the time they stay sharp cut clean no frayed cable ends, Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tool cuts bicycle cables and coat hangers very clean. Well designed, Swiss made tool.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Patrick Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best I've ever worked this, cuts bike cables clean and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Cutter for my husband's business
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cutter for my husband as I am not in to cutting wire! He uses the cutter in his business and he told me that it performs very well, much better than the cutter that he had stolen. If something should happen to this cutter he would want another one just like this.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Etherton

customer_reviews.title: Cable cutter
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Does exactly what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wire cutter. Cuts braided wire clean without any fraying.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Mechanical Advantage in your hand
customer_reviews.text: Finally a compact cutter with good mechanical advantage. Great for cutting barb wire and fencing.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: I think everyones 5/5 reviews speak for the product well ...
customer_reviews.text: I think everyones 5/5 reviews speak for the product well. Just wanted to show more pics of the the actual tool you'll be getting. Quite heavy-duty compared to the shiddy Spin Doctor ones I have been using all these years... 😎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Primate

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money over the cheap ones, Cuts galv.stranded 5/32"cable like a warm knife threw butter. Last pair lasted me 25 years
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: cutter
customer_reviews.text: The blade is very sharp and strong. Cuts are clean. Yes I would recommend this tool. Enough all ready amazon
customer_reviews.author: C. Allen

customer_reviews.title: It cuts 400 -500 lbs braided wire leader like butter and does not 'pinch' the ends
customer_reviews.text: It cuts 400 -500 lbs braided wire leader like butter and does not 'pinch' the ends. I use braided wire to make double hooks for trolling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: good European quality,cuts to the wire like knife to the butter . praise about 50 doll. less then Brefasco.Canada made in Switzerland not China for a chance
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Have had a pair of these cutters for 20+ years. Don't use them much but when I do they a difficult job very easily. Anybody who's tried to cut aircraft cable and the like with regular wire cutters, bolt cutters, a hack saw, a grinding wheel, or a torch knows how hard it is to get a clean cut. The Felco cutters make it just like cutting copper wire.
customer_reviews.author: The Sherm

customer_reviews.title: The best cable cutter made
customer_reviews.text: I've been borrowing my dad's C7 for 35 years, finally bought my own. His looks exactly the same after 40 and more years of use and nothing cuts like it. I would wait a week to do a project if dad was out of town to use the C7 rather than try another tool.
customer_reviews.author: andrewwynn

customer_reviews.title: Swiss cheezeeeeeeeeeeeeee :)
customer_reviews.text: This sucker is really nice. We bought one quite a few years ago and it still works like a charm. It can cut through wire or some other thin piece of metal rather easily. I have a feeling it's lasted this long because of the 3 magical words that don't appear on it-- made in china :) It is swiss made so the quality is top notch. it's almost like a mini bolt cutter. Nothing bad to report. It works well especially when using to cut along some fence.
customer_reviews.author: Pankil

product_meta.title: Felco Cable Cutter (F C3) - Felco Cable Cutter (F C7) - Heavy Duty Strength Steel Wire One-Hand Cable Cutter with Non-Slip Grip (7mm)
product_meta.description: Style:F C7Gives a clean cut without squashing thanks to the triangular cutting system. Blades & center bolt in high-quality hardened steel for exceptional performance with THUMB catch designed for one-handed operation. Pressed steel handles with non-slip grips.
feature_bullets: Premium Components - Engineered and designed in Switzerland, this cable cutter is constructed of premium steel components designed for excellent performance and long-lasting durability.

High-Quality Durability - This cable cutters' steel construction with a plastic non-slip grip is designed to last. The design features easily replaceable parts and can be regularly maintained with Felco's synthetic lubricant for maximum longevity.
For Medium Cables - The premium cutting tool has a 0.28 inch (7mm) diameter that is ideal for clipping smaller cables and wire. Unique triangular cutting jaws never leave a frayed end on cut cables
Ergonomic Design - This wire snipper is designed to minimize stress on your hands. The cutter features a thumb catch designed for one-handed operation, as well as a supple spring for greater comfort.

Versatile Use - Unlike some cutting tools, this wire cutter works for a large variety of uses. Whether cutting copper cable for a circuit breaker or you need to adjust the brake cable rope on your bike, the Felco C7 will get the job done.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars113 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
